TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void LoadingEventHandler(object sender, LoadingEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed LoadingEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub LoadingEventHandler(sender As Object, e As LoadingEventArgs)
public delegate void LoadingEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, LoadingEventArgs ^ e);
type LoadingEventHandler = delegate of obj * LoadingEventArgs -> unit

Docs.param: A object that contains the event data.
Docs.summary: Represents the method that will handle the event of a form.

remarks.para: Important: The code skeleton for an event handler associated with the Loading event, which use the LoadingEventHandler delegate, should be added only from the Microsoft InfoPath user interface. For information on how to add event handlers in InfoPath design mode, see How Do I: Add an Event Handler.
This type or member can be accessed from code running in forms opened in Microsoft InfoPath Filler or in a Web browser.

example.para: For an example of using the LoadingEventHandler delegate, see the sample code in the Loading event of the class.
